item.title: How I Crashed RTEMS: The MrsP Experiment
item.description: Before I could even think about implementing FMLP, I had to understand the beast I was dealing with. The RTEMS 7 SMP SuperCore is strict. Very strict. I decided to start with a “simple” homework assignment: Verify the existing Multiprocessor Resource Sharing Protocol (MrsP) implementation using the smpmrsp01 test suite on the SIS/Leon3 simulator. The Experiment I wanted to see what happens when you break the rules. I modified the init.
